Close cooperation and coordination between QA/QC and HSE/SIFA is crucial for the successful and safe completion of construction projects. Germany-wide projects!

skills: QA/QC: Requirements: Sound knowledge of building materials, standards, quality management systems; experience in inspection/testing, reporting; diligence, quality awareness, analytical thinking, communication skills; technical training with additional QM qualification advantageous. Tasks: Developing/checking quality standards, inspections, defect management, documentation, improvement. HSE: Requirements: Sound knowledge of laws/guidelines (occupational health and safety, environment); experience in risk assessment, plan preparation, instruction, accident investigation; sense of responsibility, strong communication skills, assertiveness; degree in safety engineering/environment or similar with relevant additional qualifications. Tasks: Develop/review HSE guidelines, risk assessments, safety plans, instructions, accident investigation, monitoring.
